text: North Dakota is a state in the Midwestern United States. All incorporated communities in North Dakota called cities. Even if the population of a city is small, it is still called a city. There are no villages, or hamlets in North Dakota. There are 355 cities and towns. ==Cities== 2023 Rank City 2023 Estimate 2020 Census Change County Fargo Cass Bismarck Burleigh Grand Forks Grand Forks Minot Ward West Fargo Cass Williston Williams
